data.title: CSU Northridge
data.meta_description: The Sport Clubs Council is the governing body that distributes budgets, and represents, advocates, markets and plans for the Associated Students (AS) Sport Clubs. The council’s ultimate goal is to unite and involve CSUN students in a community of competitive and recreational sports while enhancing collegiate experiences and providing leadership and support.
data.text:
The Sport Clubs Council is the governing body that distributes budgets, and represents, advocates, markets and plans for the Associated Students (AS) Sport Clubs. The council’s ultimate goal is to unite and involve CSUN students in a community of competitive and recreational sports while enhancing collegiate experiences and providing leadership and support.
